org.cojen.tupl.repl.ReplicatorConfig

Packages that use ReplicatorConfig
Package
Description
org.cojen.tupl
See Database to get started with TuplDB.
org.cojen.tupl.repl
General-purpose Raft-based replication system, intended for supporting fully replicated databases.

    Set true to create the directory for the replication files, if it doesn't already exist.

    ReplicatorConfig
    ReplicatorConfig.failoverLagTimeoutMillis(long timeout)
    Set a timeout for a newly elected leader to be caught up, or else a new election is run.
    ReplicatorConfig
    ReplicatorConfig.groupToken(long token)
    Set a unique group token, which acts as a simple security measure to prevent different replication groups from communicating with each other.
    ReplicatorConfig
    ReplicatorConfig.groupTokens(long token, long altToken)
    Set a unique group token (and an alternate), which acts as a simple security measure to prevent different replication groups from communicating with each other.
    ReplicatorConfig
    ReplicatorConfig.listenAddress(SocketAddress addr)
    Optionally restrict the socket address for accepting connections, which can be a wildcard address.
    ReplicatorConfig

    Set the local member socket address and port.
    ReplicatorConfig
    ReplicatorConfig.localPort(int port)
    Set the local member socket port, for accepting connections on any address.
    ReplicatorConfig
    ReplicatorConfig.localRole(Role role)
    Set the desired local member role, which is normal by default, and for the primordial group member.
    ReplicatorConfig
    ReplicatorConfig.localSocket(ServerSocket ss)
    Explicitly specify a connected local socket, intended only for testing.
    ReplicatorConfig
    ReplicatorConfig.proxyWrites(boolean proxy)
    Pass true to proxy writes from the leader, reducing load on the leader, but increasing commit latency a bit.
    ReplicatorConfig

    Set a factory for creating new server-side sockets.
